Message.MsgText: The migration tool could not find a resource reference for resource type res_typein file file_name under dir_name.

Explanation.p: A required resource reference could not be found in the specified configuration backup file. This resource is needed to complete the migration of the Common Event Infrastructure.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Make sure the pre-migration backup process using the WASPreUpgrade tool completed without errors.

Message.MsgText: Unable to find a resource referenced by res_ref in file file_name under dir_name.

Explanation.p: A required resource could not be found in the specified configuration backup file. This resource is needed to complete the migration of the Common Event Infrastructure.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Make sure the pre-migration backup process using the WASPreUpgrade tool completed without errors.

Message.MsgText: An error occurred during installation of application appName. The application has not been installed.

Explanation.p: The migration process encountered an exception while trying to install the specified application.

ProgrammerResponse.p: See the exception message for additional information about the cause of the problem.

Message.MsgText: The migration tool could not retrieve deployment information for application appName.

Explanation.p: The migration tool was unable to retrieve information needed for application deployment from the backed-up configuration being migrated.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Make sure the pre-migration backup process using the WASPreUpgrade tool completed without errors.

Message.MsgText: An error occurred while updating the node metadata properties file for node nodeName.

Explanation.p: The AdminTask object encountered an exception while updating the event service feature information in the node metadata properties file.

ProgrammerResponse.p: See the exception message for additional information about the cause of the problem.

Message.MsgText: Starting the migration of Common Event Infrastructure.

Explanation.p: The migration process of Common Event Infrastructure has started.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Message.MsgText: The Common Event Infrastructure migration is complete.

Explanation.p: The migration process of Common Event Infrastructure has ended.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Explanation.p: The deployment of Common Event Infrastructure has started.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Message.MsgText: The deployment of Common Event Infrastructure is complete.

Explanation.p: The deployment of Common Event Infrastructure has ended.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Explanation.p: The removal of Common Event Infrastructure has started.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Message.MsgText: The removal of Common Event Infrastructure is complete.

Explanation.p: The removal of Common Event Infrastructure has ended.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Explanation.p: The installation of Common Event Infrastructure Mdb has started.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Message.MsgText: The installation of Common Event Infrastructure Mdb is complete.

Explanation.p: The installation of Common Event Infrastructure Mdb has ended.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Explanation.p: The removal of Common Event Infrastructure Mdb has started.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Message.MsgText: The removal of Common Event Infrastructure Mdb is complete.

Explanation.p: The removal of Common Event Infrastructure Mdb has ended.

ProgrammerResponse.p: Check the trace logs for additional information.

Message.MsgText: Username/password information must be provided when migrating with security enabled.

Explanation.p: Username/password information must be provided when migrating with security enabled.

ProgrammerResponse.p: See the exception message for additional information about the cause of the problem.
